short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A basic notepad extension for Chrome to easily save your text in short time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your text with the help of this extension. It does not matter whatever tab you open. You just have to click on this extension and after that you can save your text very easily. Remember one thing that after pasting text in this notepad ware extension you need to click on save button. Because if you don't click on save button then your text will not be saved so remember this thing.
